pkgmetadata.longdescription: NPLS Regression with L1 Penalization // Tools for performing variable selection in three-way data using N-PLS in combination with L1 penalization. The N-PLS model (Rasmus Bro, 1996 DOI:10.1002/(SICI)1099-128X(199601)10:1%3C47::AID- CEM400%3E3.0.CO;2-C) is the natural extension of PLS (Partial Least Squares) to N-way structures, and tries to maximize the covariance between X and Y data arrays. The package also adds variable selection through L1 penalization.
